# placeholderForCreatedCollectionList

**Instance Property**

A placeholder object for the collection list that the change request creates.

## Declaration

```swift
var placeholderForCreatedCollectionList: PHObjectPlaceholder { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this property if you need to reference the collection created by a change request within the same change block. For details on change blocks, see [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHPhotoLibrary].

## Managing Collection Lists

- **creationRequestForCollectionList(withTitle:)**: Creates a request for adding a new collection list to the Photos library.
- **deleteCollectionLists(_:)**: Requests to delete the specified asset collections.
